Aight so from the looks of things this kid keeps getting his ass whooped. Just from a rough estimation alone the black dude looks around 6’3 (182cm) 180-215lbs (83kg - 97kg) and the blonde hair kid looks around 5’3 (152cm) 80-90lbs (36kg - 40kg). The way I see it is, the blonde kid won’t be able to win in a fair fight. Ima list some but not all ways that the blonde kid could beat the black guy.

1.  The blonde kid gathers a group of people and they jump the black guy. Even if the black dude is strong he can’t beat all of them at once, especially if the blond kid’s group of friends all have weapons of some sort.

2.  The blonde kid gets a quick and hard attack at the black guy’s balls. Once the blond kid makes the black guy fall over from ball damage pain, the blonde kid could stomp out the black guy’s vulnerable parts, for example his face, his neck, his balls again, his head, his ribs, etc.

3. Steroids. 

4. Gun.

These comments, I can't- Whenever there is a black dude in hentai or is a ntr(in this case it's both) the comments are always the best parts, it's always kill that niger, or, everyone who likes ntr is a fucked up, insecure, incel. I fucking hate ntr but I'm confused why y'all have to impose it on other people that its bad. In real life it's bad, but this is a hentai; it's not real. It's just their fetish. While I do kinda feel bad for the blond dude Idk why you all ask for a "happy/good ending" where he kills the black guy, it's literally impossible. If he could and wasn't afraid to face the consequences, he would have. I also prefer happy/ good endings, but not everything goes your way. It's not impossible to avoid ntr, just blacklist it, no need to actively search for it just to hate. As for why y'all can't handle a black dude in hentai, that's beyond me. Whatever, I thought I'd just put in my 0 cents. Oh and I'm a hypocrite so I'll probably completely contradict this in the future.
